device.name: max32660
device.description: MAX32660 Tiny, Ultra-Low-Power ARM Cortex-M4 Processor with FPU-Based Microcontroller with 256KB Flash and 96KB SRAM.

register.name: ACTRL
register.description: Access Control Register. Writing the ACTRL register with the following values in the order shown, allows read and write access to the system and user Information block: pflc-actrl = 0x3a7f5ca3; pflc-actrl = 0xa1e34f20; pflc-actrl = 0x9608b2c1. When unlocked, a write of any word will disable access to system and user information block. Readback of this register is always zero.

field.name: FLASH_PAGE_FLIP
field.description: Flips the Flash bottom and top halves.

enumeratedValue.name: swapped
enumeratedValue.description: Bottom half mapped to logical top half and vice versa.

enumeratedValue.name: flush
enumeratedValue.description: Code Caches and CPU instruction buffer are flushed.

enumeratedValue.name: hirc
enumeratedValue.description: The internal 96 MHz oscillator is used for the system clock.

enumeratedValue.name: nano_ring
enumeratedValue.description: The nano-ring output is used for the system clock.

enumeratedValue.name: x32k
enumeratedValue.description: X32K is used for the system clock.

enumeratedValue.name: busy
enumeratedValue.description: Switchover to the new clock source (as selected by CLKSEL) has not yet occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: ready
enumeratedValue.description: System clock running from CLKSEL clock source.

field.name: HIRC_EN
field.description: 60MHz High Frequency Internal Reference Clock Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: light_sleep
enumeratedValue.description: Memory is in Light Sleep mode.

enumeratedValue.name: light_sleep
enumeratedValue.description: Memory is in Light Sleep mode.

enumeratedValue.name: outputs_disable
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Outputs SCLO and SDAO disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: outputs_enable
enumeratedValue.description: I2C Outputs SCLO and SDAO enabled.

field.name: READ
field.description: This bit reflects the R/W bit of an address match (AMI = 1) or general call match(GCI = 1).

field.name: SCL_STRD
field.description: This bit will disable slave clock stretching when set.

enumeratedValue.name: disabled
enumeratedValue.description: Standard open-drain operation: drive low for 0, Hi-Z for 1.

enumeratedValue.name: enabled
enumeratedValue.description: Non-standard push-pull operation: drive low for 0, drive high for 1.

enumeratedValue.name: not_actively_driving_scl_clock
enumeratedValue.description: Device not actively driving SCL clock cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: actively_driving_scl_clock
enumeratedValue.description: Device operating as master and actively driving SCL clock cycles.

enumeratedValue.name: by_st
enumeratedValue.description: Bystander state (ongoing transaction but not participant - another master addressing another slave).

field.name: GCI
field.description: Slave General Call Address Match Interrupt.

field.name: GCIE
field.description: Slave mode general call address match received input enable.

field.name: AMIE
field.description: Slave mode incoming address match interrupt.

field.name: RXTHIE
field.description: RX FIFO Above Treshold Level Interrupt Enable.

field.name: TXTHIE
field.description: TX FIFO Below Treshold Level Interrupt Enable.

field.name: ADRACKIE
field.description: Received Address ACK from Slave Interrupt.

field.name: ADRERIE
field.description: Master Mode Address NACK Received Interrupt.

field.name: DATERIE
field.description: Master Mode Data NACK Received Interrupt.

field.name: DNRERIE
field.description: Slave Mode Do Not Respond Interrupt.

field.name: STRTERIE
field.description: Out of Sequence START condition detected interrupt.

field.name: STOPERIE
field.description: Out of Sequence STOP condition detected interrupt.

field.name: MAMIE
field.description: Multiple Slave Address Match Interrupt Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: not_respond_rx_fifo_empty
enumeratedValue.description: Do not respond to address match when RX_FIFO is not empty.

enumeratedValue.name: hold_scl_low
enumeratedValue.description: Hold SCL low on TX_FIFO empty.

field.name: FLSH_GCADDR_DIS
field.description: TX FIFO Auto Flush Disable on General Call Address Match.

enumeratedValue.name: autoflush_en
enumeratedValue.description: The TX FIFO is automatically flushed on a General Call Address Match.

enumeratedValue.name: autoflush_dis
enumeratedValue.description: The TX FIFO is not flushed on a General Call Address Match.

field.name: FLSH_SLADDR_DIS
field.description: TX FIFO Auto Flush Disable for Slave Address Match.

enumeratedValue.name: autoflush_en
enumeratedValue.description: The TX FIFO is automatically flushed on a Slave Address Match.

enumeratedValue.name: autoflush_dis
enumeratedValue.description: The TX FIFO is not flushed on a Slave Address Match.

field.name: FLSH_NACK_DIS
field.description: TX FIFO Auto Flush Disable for NACK.

enumeratedValue.name: autoflush_en
enumeratedValue.description: The TX FIFO is automatically flushed if a NACK is received at the end of a slave transaction.

enumeratedValue.name: autoflush_dis
enumeratedValue.description: The TX FIFO is not flushed when a NACK is received at the end of a slave transaction.

field.name: DATA
field.description: Data is read from or written to this location.

field.name: START
field.description: Setting this bit to 1 will start a master transfer.

field.name: RESTART
field.description: Setting this bit to 1 will generate a repeated START.

field.name: STOP
field.description: Setting this bit to 1 will generate a STOP condition.

field.name: RAMRET_SEL0
field.description: System RAM 0 Data retention in BACKUP mode.

field.name: RAMRET_SEL1
field.description: System RAM 1 Data retention in BACKUP mode.

field.name: RAMRET_SEL2
field.description: System RAM 2 Data retention in BACKUP mode.

field.name: RAMRET_SEL3
field.description: System RAM 3 Data retention in BACKUP mode.

field.name: VCORE_DET_BYPASS
field.description: Bypass V CORE External Supply Detection.

field.name: BG_OFF
field.description: Band Gap Disable for DEEPSLEEP and BACKUP Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: off
enumeratedValue.description: Bandgap is OFF in DeepSleep mode(default).

field.name: VCORE_POR_DIS
field.description: V CORE POR Disable for DEEPSLEEP and BACKUP Mode.

field.name: VCORE_SVM_DIS
field.description: V CORE Supply Voltage Monitor Disable.

register.name: LP_WAKEFL
register.description: Low Power Mode Wakeup Flags for GPIO0.

field.name: WAKEST
field.description: Wakeup IRQ flags (write ones to clear).

register.name: LPWK_EN
register.description: Low Power I/O Wakeup Enable Register 0.

enumeratedValue.name: noise_immune
enumeratedValue.description: Always operate in Noise Immune Mode.

enumeratedValue.name: quiet_in_stop_with_warmup
enumeratedValue.description: Operate in Noise Immune Mode normally, switch to Quiet Mode on Stop Mode entry.

enumeratedValue.name: quiet_in_stop_no_warmup
enumeratedValue.description: Operate in Noise Immune Mode normally, switch to Quiet Mode on Stop Mode entry.

enumeratedValue.name: 2x
enumeratedValue.description: Selects 2X bias current for RTC oscillator.

enumeratedValue.name: 4x
enumeratedValue.description: Selects 4X bias current for RTC oscillator.

register.name: ADDR
register.description: Read-only field set by the SIB block if a CRC error occurs during the read of the OTP memory.

register.name: DATA
register.description: Register for reading and writing the FIFO.

field.name: DATA
field.description: This register is used for the SPI0 transmit and receive FIFO.

field.name: SS_IO
field.description: Slave Select 0, IO direction, to support Multi-Master mode,Slave Select 0 can be input in Master mode.

enumeratedValue.name: input
enumeratedValue.description: Slave Select 0 is input, only valid if MMEN=1.

enumeratedValue.name: start
enumeratedValue.description: Master Initiates a transaction, this bit is self clearing when transactions are done.

enumeratedValue.name: deassert
enumeratedValue.description: SPI De-asserts Slave Select at the end of a transaction.

enumeratedValue.name: assert
enumeratedValue.description: SPI leaves Slave Select asserted at the end of a transaction.

field.name: SS_SEL
field.description: Slave Select, when in Master mode selects which Slave devices are selected.

enumeratedValue.name: rising_edge
enumeratedValue.description: Data Sampled on clock rising edge.

enumeratedValue.name: falling_edge
enumeratedValue.description: Data Sampled on clock falling edge.

field.name: SS_POL
field.description: Slave Select Polarity, each Slave Select can have unique polarity.

enumeratedValue.name: disabled
enumeratedValue.description: Duty cycle control of serial clock generation is disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: disabled
enumeratedValue.description: Duty cycle control of serial clock generation is disabled.

field.name: TX_FIFO_LEVEL
field.description: Transmit FIFO level that will trigger a DMA request, also level for threshold status.

field.name: TX_FIFO_EN
field.description: Transmit FIFO enabled for SPI transactions.

field.name: TX_FIFO_CLEAR
field.description: Clear TX FIFO, clear is accomplished by resetting the read and write pointers.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Clear the Transmit FIFO, clears any pending TX FIFO status.

field.name: TX_FIFO_CNT
field.description: Count of entries in TX FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: disabled
enumeratedValue.description: TX DMA requests are disabled, andy pending DMA requests are cleared.

field.name: RX_FIFO_LEVEL
field.description: Receive FIFO level that will trigger a DMA request, also level for threshold status.

field.name: RX_FIFO_EN
field.description: Receive FIFO enabled for SPI transactions.

field.name: RX_FIFO_CLEAR
field.description: Clear RX FIFO, clear is accomplished by resetting the read and write pointers.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Clear the Receive FIFO, clears any pending RX FIFO status.

field.name: RX_FIFO_CNT
field.description: Count of entries in RX FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: disabled
enumeratedValue.description: RX DMA requests are disabled, any pending DMA requests are cleared.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

field.name: M_DONE
field.description: Master Done, set when SPI Master has completed any transactions.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

field.name: TX_OVR
field.description: Transmit FIFO Overrun, set when the AMBA side attempts to write data to a full transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

field.name: TX_UND
field.description: Transmit FIFO Underrun, set when the SPI side attempts to read data from an empty transmit FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

field.name: RX_OVR
field.description: Receive FIFO Overrun, set when the SPI side attempts to write to a full receive FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

field.name: RX_UND
field.description: Receive FIFO Underrun, set when the AMBA side attempts to read data from an empty receive FIFO.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

field.name: RX_LEVEL
field.description: RX FIFO Threshold Crossed interrupt enable.

field.name: TX_LEVEL
field.description: Wake on TX FIFO Threshold Crossed.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

field.name: RX_LEVEL
field.description: Wake on RX FIFO Threshold Crossed.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

enumeratedValue.name: clear
enumeratedValue.description: Flag is set when value read is 1.

field.name: TX_LEVEL
field.description: Wake on TX FIFO Threshold Crossed Enable.

field.name: TX_EMPTY
field.description: Wake on TX FIFO Empty Enable.

field.name: RX_LEVEL
field.description: Wake on RX FIFO Threshold Crossed Enable.

field.name: RX_FULL
field.description: Wake on RX FIFO Full Enable.

enumeratedValue.name: idle_low
enumeratedValue.description: SCLK idles Low (0) after character transmission/reception.

enumeratedValue.name: idle_high
enumeratedValue.description: SCLK idles High (1) after character transmission/reception.

enumeratedValue.name: active_edge
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit on active edge of SCLK.

enumeratedValue.name: inactive_edge
enumeratedValue.description: Transmit on inactive edge of SCLK.

field.name: BIRQ
field.description: Baud Rate Generator Timer Interrupt Request.

enumeratedValue.name: lo
enumeratedValue.description: The SSEL pin will be driven low.

enumeratedValue.name: hi
enumeratedValue.description: The SSEL pin will be driven high.

enumeratedValue.name: halt
enumeratedValue.description: Halt transmit and receive FIFO and DMA access, transmit 0's.

enumeratedValue.name: replaced
enumeratedValue.description: Audio data is synchronized with SSEL.

field.name: COUNT
field.description: The current count value for the timer.

field.name: enabled
field.description: UART enabled, to enable UART block, it is used to drive a gated clock in order to save power consumption when UART is not used.

field.name: PARITY_MODE
field.description: When PARITY_EN=1, selects odd, even, Mark or Space parity.

field.name: PARITY_LVL
field.description: Selects parity based on 1s or 0s count (when PARITY_EN=1).

enumeratedValue.description: Parity calculation is based on number of 1s in frame.
Parity calculation is based on number of 0s in frame.

field.name: STOP
field.description: Selects the number of stop bits that will be generated.

enumeratedValue.name: enabled
enumeratedValue.description: HW Flow Control with RTS/CTS enabled.

field.name: NULLMOD
field.description: NULL Modem Support (RTS/CTS and TXD/RXD swap).

enumeratedValue.name: enabled
enumeratedValue.description: Break characters are sent (all the bits are at '0' including start/parity/stop).

field.name: TX_BUSY
field.description: Read-only flag indicating the UART transmit status.

field.name: RX_BUSY
field.description: Read-only flag indicating the UARTreceiver status.

field.name: RX_EMPTY
field.description: Read-only flag indicating the RX FIFO state.

field.name: RX_FULL
field.description: Read-only flag indicating the RX FIFO state.

field.name: TX_EMPTY
field.description: Read-only flag indicating the TX FIFO state.

field.name: TX_FULL
field.description: Read-only flag indicating the TX FIFO state.

field.name: RX_NUM
field.description: Indicates the number of bytes currently in the RX FIFO.

field.name: TX_NUM
field.description: Indicates the number of bytes currently in the TX FIFO.

field.name: RX_FRAME_ERROR
field.description: Enable for RX Frame Error Interrupt.

field.name: RX_PARITY_ERROR
field.description: Enable for RX Parity Error interrupt.

field.name: CTS
field.description: Enable for CTS signal change interrupt.

field.name: RX_OVERRUN
field.description: Enable for RX FIFO OVerrun interrupt.

field.name: RX_FIFO_LVL
field.description: Enable for interrupt when RX FIFO reaches the number of bytes configured by the RXTHD field.

field.name: TX_FIFO_AE
field.description: Enable for interrupt when TX FIFO has only one byte remaining.

field.name: TX_FIFO_LVL
field.description: Enable for interrupt when TX FIFO reaches the number of bytes configured by the TXTHD field.

field.name: BREAK
field.description: Enable for received BREAK character interrupt.

field.name: LAST_BREAK
field.description: Enable for Last break character interrupt.

field.name: FRAME
field.description: FLAG for RX Frame Error Interrupt.

field.name: PARITY
field.description: FLAG for RX Parity Error interrupt.

field.name: CTS
field.description: FLAG for CTS signal change interrupt.

field.name: RX_OVR
field.description: FLAG for RX FIFO Overrun interrupt.

field.name: RX_FIFO_LVL
field.description: FLAG for interrupt when RX FIFO reaches the number of bytes configured by the RXTHD field.

field.name: TX_FIFO_AE
field.description: FLAG for interrupt when TX FIFO has only one byte remaining.

field.name: TX_FIFO_LVL
field.description: FLAG for interrupt when TX FIFO reaches the number of bytes configured by the TXTHD field.

field.name: BREAK
field.description: FLAG for received BREAK character interrupt.

field.name: LAST_BREAK
field.description: FLAG for Last break character interrupt.

field.name: IBAUD
field.description: Integer portion of baud rate divisor value.

field.name: CLKDIV
field.description: FACTOR must be chosen to have IDIV>0.

field.name: DBAUD
field.description: Decimal portion of baud rate divisor value.

field.name: FIFO
field.description: Load/unload location for TX and RX FIFO buffers.

field.name: DATA
field.description: Reading from this field returns the next character available at the output of the TX FIFO (if one is available, otherwise 00h is returned).

field.name: WDT_RST
field.description: Writing the watchdog counter 'reset sequence' to this register resets the watchdog counter.

enumeratedValue.name: seq0
enumeratedValue.description: The first value to be written to reset the WDT.

enumeratedValue.name: seq1
enumeratedValue.description: The second value to be written to reset the WDT.
